name: XWUI Skeleton Component
description: Loading skeleton placeholder component for showing content placeholders while data is loading. Supports various variants (text, circular, rectangular, rounded), animations (pulse, wave), and customizable dimensions.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

width.description: Width of the skeleton (string or number)

height.description: Height of the skeleton (string or number)

lines.description: Number of lines for text variant

lineHeight.description: Line height for text variant (CSS value)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the skeleton

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
